title: Caregiver, CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: Initial telephone screening very simple yes or no answers. In person interview Very simple and straightforward questions and answers. What shift, what experience applies to the job, do you think you can handle all of these requirements?
Interview Questions: Why should I choose you over my other applicants ?

title: Instructional Designer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: Very personable screening process. Easy to talk to. Easy flowing conversation. Short 20 minute first interview call. Very responsive to email correspondence. The lady was very flexible with the date, time for the interview call.
Interview Questions: Tell me a bit about yourself

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Summit, NJ) in May 2023
Interview Descriptions: I applied through their website careers portal. The manager of the unit that I applied for called me in for an interview. She did not tell me that I’d be meeting with her along with two other people. They asked me situational questions and basic personality questions. After the interview, I did not get an email stating that I wasn’t selected. I had to log back onto the careers portal to find out for myself.
Interview Questions: Tell me a strength and a weakness Tell me about your most stressful day at work and how did you resolve it Tell me about a time where you had to work with a difficult coworker Why should we hire you over other candidates?

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: The interview was pleasant, I didn’t get i offers yet but was very interesting , people are friendly, the place is nice and clean, I was feeling like I was talking with friends
Interview Questions: Experience, my background, what I look for in a career and if I’m passionate about my career

title: Compliance Specialist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Elizabeth, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: Easy - one round, got the offer by the end of the first call. The person that hired me is no longer with the company so the process is likely different.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Data Entry Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Mar 2023
Interview Descriptions: A few question via Ring central. Very straight forward and fairly question sand then gave me an offer in 48 hours. Wasn't bad just surprising how fast the process moved.
Interview Questions: Database questions that consist of administrative task

title: Senior Manager Consulting Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: A three-round interview process with a recruiter, hiring manager, and HR Director. The overall process took about three 1/2 weeks from the initial call with the recruiter. It was a straightforward and candid interview with some behavioral questions and general questions about yourself.
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself. Could you walk us through a problem you solved? How do you work across cross-functional teams? How do you prioritize competing priorities?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: received an email with a link to sign up for a first round interview. first round with HR, asked basic behavioral and experience related questions. what are strengths what are you involved in on campus etc.
Interview Questions: What community service are you involved in?

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (New Providence, NJ) in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Interview went well. Met with two people who I would be working under. General interview questions: inquired about my experience on my resume. Brief details given on the position. When would I be able to start the position? Was I familiar with the area?
Interview Questions: When was a time I had to deal with a difficult issue? What was the outcome? What is the reason Im looking to switch jobs? Do I have EHR experience? What are my strengths? Weakness/ what I can be better at?

title: Talent Acquisition Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: It was Seamless, positive . They made me excited about the potential of growing in this well established system. The interview was friendly and engaging even though it was virtual.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: New Grad ER Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Consisted of 1 telephone interview followed by 1 in-person panel interview with various staff nurses, emergency room nurse educators, and assistant managers. Very competitive interview process with many applicants. The staff was very kind and welcoming during the interviews.
Interview Questions: What qualities make for an amazing ER nurse?

title: Physicians' Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Very smooth with positive feedback; i learned a lot about the organization in a friendly atmosphere. the interviewers were engaging and interested. They were able to provide information about scope of job and compensation and benefits
Interview Questions: How did i hear about them

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interview was via Zoom with both Assistant Nurse Managers from the floor. They mostly asked generic behavioral questions and about my nursing school experience so far. The vibe was pretty relaxed. I was offered the position within 48 hours.
Interview Questions: Describe a time you went above and beyond for a patient. Describe a time you had a difficult interaction with a patient or family member. What did you do to resolve the issue? Why do you want to work for Atlantic Health? etc...

title: Administrative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Applied via the online portal. There was a  Long wait time to be contacted for interview. Once interview conducted, Long time between communication from Hiring team & required follow up.
Interview Questions: How my experience makes me a prime candidate for role.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: Interview was held by various people, manager, assistant managers, and unit educators. Consisted of personal getting to know you questions and scenario based questions. It can be quite intimidating when there is many people present but if you are confident in your skills and experience, it will go smoothly!
Interview Questions: What is a magnet hospital?

title: Office Associate I Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: General manager starts with initial process of questions and going over background. Later on has medical director ask questions of his own after tour which would be based on how you would react at a hypothetical situation
Interview Questions: How would you react towards a problem you are not familiar with

title: Social Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Had a peer interview which was a very negative experience. Employees did not seem happy in their job at all and were not trying to hide it. It was disappointing
Interview Questions: Did I know this job would include weekend work?

title: Summer Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: Took 3 months of communication. He went off the grid for weeks to months at a time, then would say one position was closed, then offered me another. After I interviewed for that position, two weeks later he said it was closed, then offered me a position with the first internship I applied to.
Interview Questions:
What would you do in certain situations?
Describe yourself (3 strengths, 3 weaknesses)
Describe what you enjoy doing

title: Speech Pathologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Conversation about previous clinical experience and gained information on position caseload and expectations. There was a tour of facility following interview and opportunity to ask questions occurred throughout process - very comfortable experience
Interview Questions: Tell me about ______ experience

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Impossible to get interview unless you know somebody or unless you hit all the key words their automated system is looking for. Super short staffed, hire many travel nurses but will treat current employees poorly.
Interview Questions: How did you deal with a difficult situation at work in the past?

title: Manager Role Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was smooth and went well.  I first met with the hiring manager and a few weeks later met with a senior HR person.  It was about a six-week process, I thought everything went well, but did not hear back after the interview (the HR person shared they were going to be making a decision soon).  It would have been nice to receive an email sharing that they decided to go with another candidate, but  I never heard anything back).
Interview Questions: Share your experience or give an example of doing x in your current role?

title: Finance Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Interview was held by three different supervisors. Went pretty smooth, they did reiterate growth isn't happening quickly it takes time. They want to make sure customer service is A1. Quality over quantity.
Interview Questions: Still waiting on an offer.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Good and easy. All of my questions were answered. I answered all of their questions to the best of my ability. Everyone was on time and professional.  Hopefully this helped you all
Interview Questions: Why you want to work here

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Open house with multiple interviewers.   Leadership interviews followed by peer interview. Vendor interviews was the last.  Then you were dismissed, but I was then called back as I was walking out and was asked to wait for about 20 mins. Then they told me I could leave and that I would be called.   Strange.
Interview Questions: Tell us about prior experience

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: Was easy they were friendly, they asked about past experience, what you would do in specific situations and who you would report too. Wasn't hard at all they made me feel very comfortable
Interview Questions: What would you do in specific situations for example if a customer asked you to do something you're not allowed too etc

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Smooth, great communication from nursing floor during the process. There was a very Quick orientation turnaround time which allowed for a speedy on boarding process for me. There were resources available if needed.
Interview Questions: What are your professional plans

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: My interview with Atlantic Health was a series of questions for management to get me to do what they wanted me to do. Will you be okay going to other facilities 1 week a year to allow someone else from another facility to go on vacation? Not telling me that this was putting me into a float pool and them telling me where i would go the day before (floating me to 4 of the facilities whenever they wanted to.) sometimes a different facility every day of the week. I was told i would be on call 1 day of the week and one weekend a month. This was a lie as I ended up being on call anywhere from 15-22 days a month. Per diems were permitted to pick first which meant they always picked the week days, which left the Full timers to be forced to pick up the call on all of the other days… meaning i was on call almost every weekend.
Interview Questions: How would you respond to a physician that asked you to do something that you were uncomfortable with.

title: Lab Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Newton, NJ) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions:
1. Applied online on the company website 
2. Spoke on the phone with the interviewer to briefly discuss the role, myself, and set up an interview time
3. Interviewed in person and was given a tour of the facility
4. Received an email from HR
Interview Questions: Described and experience where you worked with someone who you did not get along with?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: My interview process consisted of an interview with the nurse manager and a phone call with the recruiter. Had a few patient scenario questions in addition to the standard interview questions. Overall, the interview process was easy and relaxed and both the hiring manager and the recruiter were very informative.
Interview Questions: Can you tell me about yourself

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Did a microsoft team meeting for the i interview. They asked me about what I wanna do in five years, what can I bring to the team, and those general interview questions.
Interview Questions: I wanna do in five years, what can I bring to the team, and those general interview questions.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Jersey City, NJ) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: Descriptive about job functions and staff culture. Could tell they valued supporting new employees. Spent about equal time talking as I did listening and felt well informed after the interview. The people I interviewed with were polite and friendly to the utmost caliber.
Interview Questions: What is important to you as an employee?

title: Nurse Practitioner Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Straight forward, organized, as expected; met folks from multiple levels of the org. Provided transportation to the area from out of state based on personal travel preferences, recruiter extremely welcoming and adept, nice thank you gift.
Interview Questions: I would never disclose this type of information. It was standard for the role.

title: EMT-B Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: I had no video calls only phone calls which is good so they do not care what you look like. But, nobody from my department interviewed me only human resources did.
Interview Questions: Talk about a time I was faced with a challenge.

title: Trainer Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: The manager and lead analyst interviews you. It was a friendly interview. You are asked whether you can handle the fast pace and how well you manage projects. I was told by HR to prepare a lesson to teach the interview panel. I received really positive about teaching the lesson I prepared but I never heard back after the interview. I received an automated email saying I didn’t get the job after a pretty long interview process.
Interview Questions: How do you handle competing priorities?

title: Call Center Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: Very good they really care about you and what your goals are. Why would you choose Atlantic Heatlh? Es plainer all their benefits. Described the position and what the hours would be. And asked to tell them about yourself
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in a year or two

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and after a few days, met with HR over the phone to discuss job details and availability. The next step was meeting with the hiring manager of the unit.
Interview Questions: Can you tell me about yourself

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Simple 3 Questions where they put you in a different scenario and see how you handle the situation.
Ex. a time where you had to work with someone you weren’t familiar with.
Interview Questions: A time where you had to solve a problem where the answer wasn’t clearly In your face

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Newton, NJ) in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: First I met with the Assistant nurse manager.  They asked  several questions. Then I had a phone interview with HR.  I received an email with an offer the same day.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a difficult situation you were in and how you handled it

title: Talent Acquisition Lead Interview
Application Type: The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Phone interview, followed by on-site with recruiting manager, then 2nd on-site. Very basic questions about experience. 

The Second on-site interview completely turned me off from the company. The interviewer was late to the interview, admitted they hadn’t even looked looked at my resume and asked me what position I was interviewing for.  Overall,  this left a horrible impression of the company and team. 

The worst part was after a phone interview and 2 on-site interviews there was zero follow up!  I sent a follow up message with no response. I can understand no response if you are just an applicant but after 3 interviews some sort of response is required. Between the lack of communication and the Interviewers not being engaged I would never pursue a position there in the future.
Interview Questions: Walk me through your resume

title: Nutrition Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Pompton Plains, NJ) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: Easy , and practical. 2 interview process, with two different people. The recruiter asks you more questions than the boss. First you get interviewed with the recruiter , then the boss interviews you and asks you a few questions.
Interview Questions: I hat did you do in your last job .

title: Assistant MOA Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Great; interviewer was very relatable. Made me believe there was a position for me though and then did not follow through with it. I felt like i wasted my time to be honest but over all, great interview process.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Applied online. Invited to a job fair, which hasn’t been my typical experience with hospitals . Met with HR to go over a few things. Then with the supervisor of the unit. She asked me standard interview questions.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you had to learn something really fast

title: Rec Therapy Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Summit, NJ) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview. Took about 5 min. Just a get to know you interview. Offered me a job right on the call. It helped that I did my internship there. Pleasant interview
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Mental Health Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Elizabeth, NJ) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Went great, and was super comfortable! The woman was very nice, and asked me good questions. Normally interviews make me nervous but I was not at all! Overall, one of the best ive been on!
Interview Questions: Tell me a Strength about yourself

title: Community Health Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: The entire process took 3 months from when I applied to ultimately got rejected from the job. In their defense, it was a new position so they have to be thorough but it took up a lot of my time and set my hopes up high. I believe there were 4 interviews in total. They also took at least 2-3 weeks to get back to me in between each interview.
Interview Questions: They asked me behavioral questions, asking me about a time I handled something well. They also asked me about which populations I would be comfortable working with and wanted to know more about my knowledge about the field.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Went well -- I found them to be helpful and kind in dealing with others.  It was a great way to end the day. I know there s no way you will read this.
Interview Questions: Approach to learning?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in May 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Two phone interviews were fairly basic and easy. 

Asked the typical interview questions and gave me an offer after the second interview.

Was a quick process overall and painless.  I was surprised they did not do a video interview.
Interview Questions: Tell me a little bit about yourself

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: I had two phone interviews with recruiter, and one in-person interview. The in-person interview started 45 minutes late and there was never any follow-up from the in-person interview.
Interview Questions: Walk me through your resume.

title: Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: I received a call for interview.  Pharmacy manager and one other person did the intervie. It was really good experience. They asked about availability first. Why I want to work for the company.
Interview Questions: Did you ever disagree with a prescriber?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: I came thru as a temp and was hired thru there. After working with the temp agency for three months, I was hired permanently.  The coordinator really liked me so worked diligently to get me in the system
Interview Questions: What’s the most difficult part of your current job

title: Fellow Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Talking about why interest in hospital and background. The interview process is done through the ACGME match. You interview with members of core faculty. There is a dinner the night before with the co fellows
Interview Questions: why morristown medical venter

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Comfortable and relaxed environment although did not have any choice of the date/time of the interview and was unaware it was during an open house. Met with one manager and then the recruiter. Took less than an hour overall and got a phone call with an offer a few days later.
Interview Questions: How do you handle a difficult coworker? How do you interact with your aides? Recall a time you had to learn a new skill quickly,

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: HR called 3 months after I applied on the website, on the day of the interview, i was given a tour of the floor that I would be working on, sat down and talked about the position, no questions asked so it was more of a casual conversation with the coordinator, heard back in 1 and  a half weeks
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in May 2018
Interview Descriptions: Smooth. People at AHS are amazing. HR interview will emphasize on different pt scenarios but if you have some nursing experience you will succeed. The interview with the unit manager is related to nursing tasks.
Interview Questions: What do want to be part of the facility?

title: Credentialing Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions:
Filled application online. 2 weeks later received a call for interview. 
Interview lasted about 45 minutes. They asked basic interview questions.
Then the manager proceed to tell me about their " family environment".
I received a call a few days later, I got the job and HR started the paperwork.
there was nothing there with a "family environment'.
Interview Questions: they asked me questions about my resume, and experience as well as the basic interview questions that they ask everywhere else.

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Pompton Lakes, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: I went through a recruiter, and was called in for an interview the next week.  When I arrived at the location, I was cheerfully greeted by the Recruiter.  We went into her office, and she described the position and the skills needed.  About half-way through the interview, the Recruiter became obnoxious and very professional.  She started asking me personal questions that had nothing to do with the job or my experience or my skills.  In my opinion, Atlantic Health Systems should develop guidelines for their Human Resources Recruiters on how to interview more professionally.
Interview Questions: what computer skills do you have?

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Newton, NJ) in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: Personal and professional. Met with the nursing manager and staffing coordinator who both interviewed me at the same time. During the process, reasons on why I wanted the position as well as whay is expected were discussed. Overall, the interview was excellent from both every perspective.
Interview Questions: What led me to choosing Atlantic Health system

title: Director of Total Rewards Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Summit, NJ) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions:
Applied to LinkedIn posting by Exeter Group (recruiter).

Called by research person and reviewed experience.

Scheduled to meet with team of their senior search executives.  

Meeting was typical with a lot of back and forth.  Didn't get passed to AHS since I didn't have Hospital background.
Interview Questions: What would you do in first 100 days?

title: Insurance Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morris Plains, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: once you receive the call of interest, please be sure to bring a legal form of ID for yourself... maybe even a copy of ID's with social security card included. bring resume & give yourself time for parking. please allow at least an hour for the interview,.
Interview Questions: reason why you would like to work for AHS

title: Support Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: After sending my resume, was called within few weeks for video interview. They had me install a software for video chat. The interview was very relaxing, no pressure. Amazing people. And did not attack much, they were very nice and easy going asking about my experience in work field. After the interview, in 2 weeks I got a call saying I was selected and wait for paper work.
Interview Questions: How well do you work with teams !?

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Newton, NJ) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: I was cross examined by 2 lower level employees. I don not think this is common, usually it is the hiring manager who will interview, but she was busy. Overall it was a laid back and easy interview.
Interview Questions: Name a time you made a mistake and what you did to correct it.

title: Event Coordinator/Fundraising Specialist (Temp Assignment) Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Pompton Plains, NJ) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was comfortable and informative.  I felt like I belonged there.  The director was easy to speak with.  She was very specific on what skills and knowledge I had.
Interview Questions: What experience do you have in event planning and fundraising?

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: I applied online via their careers section for many PCT jobs. After about 4-5 months, I got a phone call saying they were interested in having me come in for an interview. I interviewed with HR for about 25 minutes, and was then taken to the floor where I spent about an hour on the floor speaking with the nurse manager, the charge nurse, and another PCT. Everyone was very friendly and welcoming. The process went very quickly from then- PPD testing, physical with occupational health, signing contracts, etc.
Interview Questions:
Tell us about a time you had to deal with a difficult patient. How do you manage the situation?
How do you handle conflicts at work, specifically if you don't get along with another employee?
Tell us about a time you went above and beyond to help a patient. What was significant about this time?
Why should we hire you?

title: Licensed Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was thorough and direct. They asked me mostly about my nursing experiences. I had 2 interviews, but on separate days. Both nurse managers were very pleasant and friendly. They made the interview feel like a normal conversation.
Interview Questions: Name a time that you had a difficult patient or family member to deal with. How did you handle that situation? What was the outcome?

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: Interview was mostly hiring person complaining about their job and the stress they were under. Final interview was good business discussion, but every promise of support that was provided during interview ended up being a lie once employment started.
Interview Questions: Pre-interview I was allowed to visit location and interview staff. One of my questions was, "don't you agree they all need to be fired?". Very unprofessional.

title: Nurse Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Newton, NJ) in Dec 2015
Interview Descriptions: applied online. was contacted by mgr of department for a part-time position. manager pleasant on phone and very interested..set-up interview. position in Newton which is about an hour drive on the hwy for me. At interview team lead present. turned out they knew each other from St. Clares. thought interview went well. met with HR before i left. was asked for previous mgr reference which was sent to HR rep immediately.. salary was avg. .heard a week later not selected. called HR. said they hired internally..it left a bad taste in my mouth.
Interview Questions: why do you want this position. what is your past experience. what EMR are you familiar with.

title: Clinical Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Takes a long time to get called for an interview. Must submit application online only. Go in for interview, sit down and talk. do background check and pre-employment physical. I don't want to add more. You should accept what people write instead of making this process as difficult as getting a job!!!!
Interview Questions: Discuss a difficult patient or doctor that I dealt with in the past and how I handled it.

title: Certified Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Extremely nice and very good. highly professional. the interviewer was calm and very soft spoken. they made me feel relaxed and had a lot of patience. They asked me about my past experience and also my skills. They also reviewed the work samples.
Interview Questions: Q: Describe briefly about your past job?

title: PD Courier Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Aug 2015
Interview Descriptions: Very professional and comfortable. Met with the coordinator and had a good conversation. Questions were hard but eventually got it. 2 part interviews with the HR also. Make you wait until orientation to work.
Interview Questions: What was a difficult situation and how did you handle it?

title: Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Aug 2015
Interview Descriptions: Very friendly staff, can be a bit confusing to get around hospital but pleasant experience. I got a tour of the department and was explained what the hours and days that were available for work
Interview Questions: Tell us about a time that you had to deal with an unhappy customer and what did you do to resolve it

title: Unit Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions: Two-Step Interview, first received a call from human resources for a quick phone interview. Then  I received a phone call from my unit coordinator to schedule an in-person interview.
Interview Questions: Describe a time that you dealt with a difficult customer.

title: Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in May 2015
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted by an assistant to set up the interview. I interviewed and was hired. My start date was dependent on the availability of mandatory employee training for all employees.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Business Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in May 2015
Interview Descriptions: Was asked to come in 2 days after the call by the manager. Came in and interviewed with the manager and then the director. the next week I was offered the position by HR
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself going?

title: PD Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: Very easy process.  Asked about prior work experience and questions how I handled several situations at my prior job.  The recruiter then provided me with information re: benefits, PTO, and duties
Interview Questions: Did you ever have a co-worker that was difficult to work with?

title: Unit Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Summit, NJ) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview was about a half hour total. It involved the usual interview questions like describing yourself, strengths/weaknesses etc. Then I was asked about 10 different situational questions which were pretty difficult. Then finally, I was taken on a tour of the floor.
Interview Questions: What would you do if a patient's family asked you to do something that was out of your job description?

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: A series of questions by the direct manager, followed by a second interview with the same manager and their supervisor. Interview by HR, then full background, credit, employment check, drug screening and medical exam.
Interview Questions: How would you handle the aspect in other ares of your life?

title: Medical Records Representative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions: I applied to Atlantic for over 8 months before a manager from medical records department contacted me & asked me to come in for an interview. I met with the manager and the person who was going to be taking her job . They asked basic questions about my work history and accomplishments. They constantly exchanged glances with each other during my interview & had side convos. Very unprofessional . At the end of the interview she asked me if I had any questions , I was able to get one of my questions answered but she rushed me out . The interview only lasted 10-15 mins so I do not know wu the Rush was. I had another successful interview with Atlantic , (which was much more formal) and ended up gettig that position . I think it just depends on who you end up interviewing with .
Interview Questions: What character would describe you ?

title: Recruiter Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Nov 2014
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted by an agency recruiter initially for the role.  I had one 20 minute phone interview, and then one in-person interview during which I met with two different people.  Both managers were very friendly and I've heard that Atlantic Health Systems is a great company to work for.  I'm not entirely sure they really knew what they were looking for.  Shortly after interviewing I was told the position was put on hold.
Interview Questions: They asked me to describe a time when I was able to convince a candidate they should explore an opportunity that they weren't initially sure about (not in those exact words, but essentially what they were asking).

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Newton, NJ) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: I do not remember much of my interview other than I was qualified and pretty much hired on the spot since they were short staffed. it took a total of 4 weeks from interview to start
Interview Questions: my experience

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: Applied online. Got a call maybe 2 weeks later and went in for an interview. Initially met with HR recruiter, then with the office manager. Heard back fairly quickly with an offer which I accepted, no salary negotiation. Had to do background check before starting with company. Was a pretty standard interview process for administrative role.
Interview Questions: Pretty standard; asked about ability to multitask.

title: Medical Records Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System
Interview Descriptions:
I was contacted by the department coordinator for a brief 30 minute interview that consisted of situational questions that were based on the job.  It wasn't necessarily about the job functions but how you would work as a team player, problem solving, etc.  A week later, I was scheduled a phone interview with an HR person that dealt with more personality/behavioral questions that see if you would fit with the organizations goals and mission values.

The process was kind of long, especially for a per diem position.
Interview Questions: Think about a time you helped or coached a colleague

title: Business Manager Interview
Application Type: The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Parsippany, NJ) in May 2014
Interview Descriptions: intellectual conversation, felt it went smooth - asked the good questions - i was called back with in 5 weeks time to sign up and get the paper work done.  HR was smooth as well.
Interview Questions: Why did you leave your last job

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Mar 2014
Interview Descriptions: I was brought in for an interview and met the director and the person who would be my manager.  It was pretty short and sweet, I did most of the talking, afterwards, they told me if I was still interested to let them know.  I thought about it and said I was still interested, and they brought me back for another interview to meet the rest of the staff.
Interview Questions: What is your experience with Clinical Trial Research

title: Systems Support Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Pompton Plains, NJ) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: The interview was long and professional. I was interviewed by the team lead and then the manager. It took them 3 days to get back to me after the interview and they called me with a good news that I was selected. Just remember to stay focused on the interview and prepare before you go for the interview.
Interview Questions: How to troubleshoot workstation when it cannot connect to the internet, how to add The printer and workstation to the network, The process or migrating workstation from one OS to Another.

title: Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Summit, NJ) in Nov 2013
Interview Descriptions: I applied for the position and came in soon after - maybe a week or so. Very basic and standard questions, which weren't very challenging. I applied for another position at the organization which was based more on skillset and experience.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths/weaknesses?

title: Financial Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Nov 2013
Interview Descriptions: Very good process. HR was good and willing to work with you. Standard interview questions nothing out of the ordinary. Meet with my manager and senior manager.  Was able to start right away after interview.  Knowing about company culture and mission statement is very important.
Interview Questions: How I felt my personal attributes could benefit me in the job.

title: Lab Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with the head of HR and then a 1 on 1 interview with the department coordinator. Questions asked about previous work experience as well as getting a sense of your work ethic and personality
Interview Questions: Do you work well in a team setting? Do you work well under pressure? How do you handle adversity at work?

title: Doctor Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Summit, NJ) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: Met with VP Several times, he was very cordial, described salary range,and wanted to know my experience.  I told him about my experience, and ability to be a team player.
Interview Questions: Why are you working here?

title: Nursing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions: The whole process took a long time. Applied for job, exactly one month until call back for interview, had interview, waited another month for hiring decision. It will take another month for me to complete testing and paperwork before I work. Whole process 3 months. The interview was seemingly laid back but I could tell they really care about who they hire. I'm thrilled to be working there!
Interview Questions: Mostly situational questions.

title: Certified Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: My interview at Atlantic Health Systems was not any different than any other interview process.Being said that,if I was not recommended by my former manager more than likely I would not have gotten employed.Through that connection,I interviewed with both hiring managers and got hired.
Interview Questions: How long have I have been an certified technician?

title: Radiology Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: Easy interview onsite. Asked typical interview questions along with situational questions. Very easy going people. Interviewed by two people and was asked questions concerning how I would handle certain situations.
Interview Questions: What would you do if you had a very angry patient on the phone with you?

title: CMT Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: The interview is a little intimidating. You are interviewed by 3 managers, one after another. You leave the interview not knowing if they are going to offer you the position because HR has to make the offer.
Interview Questions: How did you handle a situation?

title: Administration Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Newark, NJ) in Apr 2011
Interview Descriptions: the interview itself went fast HR took time to get back to me. I made sure interviewed myself during the process. I went in strong and eager. I called constantly to get a status HR was very slow following up. I ended up calling management directly
Interview Questions: Why health Care

title: PC Support Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Morristown, NJ) in Dec 2009
Interview Descriptions: It was such a long time ago, I'm sure it has changed.  Back then, it was very low key.  I think there was only 1 interview with the manager and it was all technical questions....  But, since it's a hospital system, you need to pass all the health exams (physical, blood, urine, etc...)
Interview Questions: None that I can think of.  It was all tech stuff on PCs, printers, network stuff, login scripts, hardware/ software, etc

title: Paramedic Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Atlantic Health System (Summit, NJ) in Sept 2008
Interview Descriptions: Was contacted within 12 hours of submitting application on atlantichealth.org, interviewed 1 week later and hired within 2 weeks of interview.  Fastest interview/hiring process I have ever experienced.
Interview Questions: Questions mostly related to specific position applied for, nothing overly difficult.
